General.Name: Beijing Dataway Horizon Co. Ltd
General.Description: Beijing Dataway Horizon Co.,Ltd. provides data analysis and decision support services in China. It offers data services, including Youzhengtong, an automated comprehensive data service platform; You Caitong, which include full-process performance evaluation and data application support for the implementation of budget performance management by local financial departments and budget departments; Youshangtong services comprising urban insight, monitoring, work supervision, enterprise demand mining, and cases and cutting edge policy knowledge sharing services; and Youshuitong services, such as automatic demand data collection, intelligent analysis of multi-source data, and visualize and display services. The company also provides Shuyoupin that offers product experience optimization services; and Goods Operation System for the retail industry with an integrated intelligent management system for the front and back activities. In addition, it offers Intelligent Public Security System that provide the public security department with an intelligent management system for police situation analysis, internal affairs management, and anti-fraud measures; and city transportation center systems. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Beijing, China.
